original_text: I am very upset about what the prophets are doing. My body is shaking. I move like a man who has become drunk, someone who has drunk too much wine. I am afraid because of the Lord and the holy message that he has spoken. I am very upset about what the prophets are doing.

sentences.original_text: I am very upset about what the prophets are doing.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 예언자들이 하는 일에 대해 매우 속상합니다.

sentences.original_text: I move like a man who has become drunk,
someone who has drunk too much wine.
sentences.korean_translation: 너무 많은 포도주를 마신 사람처럼 말입니다.

sentences.original_text: I am afraid because of the Lord
and the holy message that he has spoken.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 말씀하신 거룩한 말씀 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: I am very upset about what the prophets are doing.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 예언자들이 하는 일에 대해 매우 속상합니다.
